   Tom Kertscher
   By Tom Kertscher March 16, 2021

No, Trump’s signature won’t be on the new stimulus checks; Biden’s won’t, either

    If Your Time is short

     * The Biden White House and the Treasury Department said the checks will
       be signed by a Treasury official.

A widely shared post on Instagram claims the check will have been signed
   by Donald J. Trump — who hasn’t been president for nearly two months.
"So Donald J. Trump’s signature is on the new stimulus checks.
